Dunno if you ever noticed, but when aXXo was 'alive' her uploaded all kinds of stuff. They were'nt always 'good' movies bt they were always the *real thing*.
Now, aXXo is no longer. Praise be to raymondhome. For the simple reason that *all* of his stuf is also the *real thing*!
You like it or you don't. That's not the point. This man has a green skull and crossbones and it is most deserved. He walks in the best tradition of aXXo (who knows? maybe he *is* aXXo.)
The piont is that when *he* upload something, is is what he says it is. No bullshit.
In a world absolutely full of bullshit, we should be grateful to a person of truth... in this pirate world.
And sorry for the typos. you get my point!
